storyInfo: The prison break story ends with Muelsyse revealing her true intentions, and Silence rejecting them. In the end, Muelsyse offers a word of advice and leaves.

attributes.content: Ferdinand... Director of Energy.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Well, that's kinda a surprise, but you know what really bothers me?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Just what the hell was Saria doing there?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I wanted to ask you about that myself. Why was Saria there, Director Muelsyse?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What do you mean by that?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Saria was your right-hand man in this incident, wasn't she? Out more accurately, she was your former right-hand man.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh? What makes you think that?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ever since we started our conversation, I've been wondering where you come in in this string of events.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You said you have nothing to do with HydeBro and Energy, and I believe you, but since you went out of your way to find me, you're perhaps a little too passionate for someone who's supposedly just an observer who knows about this incident.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So my preliminary judgment is that you are most likely my 'competitor' as far as this incident goes.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You want Anthony as well.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And the thing that puzzles me the most is what Saria was doing there.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She's completely cut ties with Rhine Lab. She's a Rhodes Island operator right now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The way I see it, she had no reason to get involved.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Well, I could probably say she's your trump card too.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I really didn't know she was there when it all happened.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I still remember what you said in the beginning—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The only parts I understand are the beginning—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: —HydeBro initiated this assassination plot they'd been brewing forever against Anthony Simon—the last of the Simons—who was locked up in Mansfield State Prison.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And then the very end—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: —where Anthony led a group that successfully escaped Mansfield, and then met up with you two, and made it out of Columbia.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As for everything in between... well, I had a chance to find out, but that's slipped away by now. Very sad about that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As my 'competitor', you'd know more than just that. You likely had an accomplice, who should've told you everything that happened there.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But that's all you know, and from all indications, it seems you really don't know that much about how everything unfolded there.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And considering how Saria showed up out of nowhere...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The only conclusion I can draw is—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She was working with you, but she turned her back on your agreement.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But if that was really the case, then your appearance would also be unexpected. So why would she hand Anthony over to you?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's true that all of you are working with Rhodes Island, but if everything's exactly as you said, you two wouldn't exactly be on the same side, no?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: No, and I really didn't understand why until just now either. Kafka certainly didn't stand a chance against her, so in theory she should've been the true victor of this whole incident.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And well... We didn't really know each other either, so she really didn't have much of a reason to hand Anthony over to me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I think I know the reason now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Aha, I get it. She was trying to trick me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is just my assumption.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: To her, having control over... Actually, no, I don't really want to call it that...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Let's call it a rescue. By rescuing Anthony, she became the ultimate victor.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She thinks the best place for Anthony to be isn't where you are. That would only help grow your influence, so she probably chose to take matters into her own hands.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I don't know what it is that she's doing, and I don't want to know, but she definitely knows that HydeBro won't let this slide, nor will you, now that she has betrayed you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So that's why she didn't show up until the very end. She wanted to hide the fact she was ever involved in this whole incident.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I don't really think she's scared of me or HydeBro, but okay. Probably better to just let sleeping dogs lie. I would do that too if I were her.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Besides, she probably still has something else to take care of here in Columbia... Oh, whatever. It probably doesn't have anything to do with this.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She... Whatever. Anyway, the fact we were there was probably just as much of a surprise to her. She probably got the gist of our situation from Kafka and arrived at that decision.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...Beautiful reasoning, Ms. Silence.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You're exactly right. I was the one who told Saria about this.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And my guess is Jesselton was put in jail after that; they probably figured out right afterwards that he wasn't a real prison guard. That's why I don't have much information about him.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I really got thrown for a loop by Saria this time, though. I mean, I knew she wasn't going to hand him over to me right from the start, but still...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Then why did you ask her to help?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Well, obviously—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I didn't have a choice.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: There wasn't anyone in the company trustworthy and capable enough.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If there was anyone else I could've turned to, I wouldn't have bothered asking her.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I may be Ecological's director, but I'm not actually all that powerful.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Look at how miserable I am. She stole the guy from me, and now I've got to rack my brains to see how I can get him back. You couldn't find a more miserable section director if you tried.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: So it's exactly as I thought. You brought me here because you want me to hand Anthony over to you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If I said yes, would you do it?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Anthony has already left. He's on his way to Rhodes Island. I could tell you yes, but that won't change anything.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Relax. That was my plan in the beginning, but I've had a little change of heart.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: First of all, if my hunch is correct, Rhodes Island has nothing to do with this whole affair. Your entourage is only here because they're your bodyguards on your little trip here to procure equipment, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's right. I did that not as a member of Rhodes Island, but as an individual. I... I lied to them.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Well, you're not a good liar, Ms. Silence.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Anyway, I get the gist of it now.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Your goal is probably to make Anthony a Rhodes Island operator or, at the very least, put him under the company's protection. That's the best course of action in your opinion.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And well, setting aside the question of whether Anthony would willingly subject himself to Saria's grumpiness, Saria probably wanted to keep Anthony on her leash.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But even if Anthony's okay with it, Saria probably thinks he's nothing but trouble.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's why she chose to have him join you guys at Rhodes Island. It's a pretty good choice.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Actually, she probably thinks that it's all good enough for her as long as Anthony makes it out of the prison alive and things don't go either my way or Ferdinand's.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As for what Anthony wants to do and what he can do once out of prison, that doesn't matter to her one bit.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's right. It's hard for me to imagine Saria caring about others. Actually, it felt pretty strange to me when she agreed to help me out.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But why is she okay with him joining Rhodes Island? Things could get out of hand with him at Rhodes Island too.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Probably because it keeps this whole prison affair relatively low key. If someone really looked into this mess, it would put HydeBro in the limelight, and those guys would do whatever it takes to cover all this up.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And even though Rhodes Island and Rhine Lab work together, as long as all this is kept under wraps, there's going to be a lot of room to turn things around.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: In other words, if Anthony becomes a Rhodes Island operator, he'll actually be pretty safe for the time being.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I don't really know much about Saria's work relationship with Rhodes Island, but I know a thing or two about this company.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I think if I were Rhodes Island's leader, I wouldn't mind taking in Anthony at all.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Eh, I'm so lost...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Well, to put it simply, Saria snatched away something I was hoping she would give me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But she didn't keep it for herself. She pawned it to a pretty well-guarded shop.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Oh, that's much easier to understand. But... what about it?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: So you want me, an employee of the pawn shop, to talk the owner into selling the item in question to you?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Bingo~
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If Saria decided to keep Anthony around, I guess there wasn't anything I could've done about it for the time being.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But since she chose to turn him over to Rhodes Island, there's still room for me to intervene.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm not asking you to do this all by yourself.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If Saria, the former Defense Director, was able to form a partnership with Rhodes Island, then I'm sure they'll be willing to work with me, the Ecological Director, too.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm hoping you'll act as an intermediary between me and Rhodes Island. In return, I will give you an opportunity to come back to Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It might even be the perfect opportunity for you to salvage the whole 'Diαbolic Crisis' situation.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Eh, this all sounds like you guys are about to do something bad.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea, Ms. Mayer. This is just business.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Most things in the world aren't full of tender loving care.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Just like how Rhodes Island only took in Saria because they saw value in her.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And just like how Saria handed Anthony to you guys because she thought you two would be able to escort him back to Rhodes Island safely.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As for me, I believe that even if Rhodes Island does end up taking Anthony in, they aren't going to offer him a helping hand just because he tells them about his past.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We can slap a fancy label on everything to make them seem less ugly on the outside, but that doesn't actually make them any more beautiful.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Let me give you an example. I could tell you I have very little power within the company, and then sing the praises of Control and tell you how amazing of a leader she is to make you think helping me is actually the right call.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If I had done that, you definitely wouldn't have reacted the same way as you just did.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And, you know, I'm actually really good at doing that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But I didn't do that out of the respect I have for Ms. Silence after our conversation today.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Out of respect, if you give me this lead, Anthony, I am willing to give you something that's worth just as much, if not more. What do you say, Ms. Silence?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Silence, what should we do?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I refuse.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh? How come? I think what I'm offering is beyond attractive.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Director Muelsyse, from the beginning till the very end of our conversation, you haven't ever asked me what I wanted to do with Anthony.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Did you subconsciously arrive at the conclusion that, just like you and Saria, I want Anthony, this 'lead,' as well?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: He'll be one of the ways via which I'll keep Energy in check. As for Saria, I don't really know what's on her mind, but I'm sure she has her uses for him as well.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As for you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You're a Rhine Lab researcher who had to leave the place because of an experiment gone wrong. You want to use him to wrangle something from Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I don't plan on using your so-called 'lead,' Director Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If Saria didn't show up, and Anthony was rescued some other way and then met up with Mayer and me, I would still have told him to join Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm not doing this because I want to keep a leash on him, your 'lead,' through Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Throughout our entire conversation, you used the word 'lead' to describe him over and over. I don't really like calling him that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Anthony isn't a 'lead' to me. He's a person; he's alive.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: His entire family was put behind bars in just one night, and he himself was locked up in that place for six years!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If there was a better place for him to be, I naturally would've told him and helped him get there.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm not trying to keep him around to use as a bargaining chip in the future.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's what I think is the right thing to do.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Looks like we aren't going to come to an understanding.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...I'm afraid not.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If you don't need anything else from us, we'll take our leave now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Eh, you don't really think I'll just let you walk out of here after I told you all that, right? Researcher Silence?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I don't.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's why I made an arrangement with food on hand.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Anthony!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Right here.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: You... I thought you'd already left Columbia!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The one who left was a decoy. The real Anthony has been staying with us at the hotel, and I asked him to come earlier just in case.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It was our Rhodes Island escort's idea. I didn't expect to see this arrangement come in handy here, though.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You want Anthony, don't you?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is your only chance to get your hands on him, Director Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Care for a drink, Mr. Anthony?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If the circumstances were different, I would gladly share a drink with you, Ms. Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: That's a shame, then. Let's get down to business.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Well, Mr. Anthony, would you be willing to come with me?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Only if you're able to defeat me, ma'am.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I eavesdropped on your conversation, and I must say that I don't really dislike the way you think.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: I, too, think that there are certain things that aren't quite as colorful as they may seem.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: But, after all that I've been through, I also think that there are things out there that are truly beautiful.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Well, looks like I'm being treated as the villain here.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: No, I told you before, Director Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I don't think you're a villain.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: From where you stand, what you've done couldn't be more correct, and I also think you've extended to me plenty of goodwill gestures.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's just, I'm sorry to say this, I can't bring myself to agree with the way you think. That's all.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It kinda feels like I made myself a new enemy without knowing.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You mentioned keeping Energy in check. Did something happen inside Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If you aren't going to make this deal with me, then I really can't tell you about any of that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Of course, if you don't plan on calling it quits here, I'm sure you'll find out one day.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm throwing in the towel.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm not really that confident I fight a buff dude like Anthony with just a clone.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: A clone?!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: That's right, this is just a clone. Looks real, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Let me leave you with an advice, Researcher Silence.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You may think that helping Anthony is the right thing to do.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But that couldn't be further from the truth.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's laughable to think the Simon Co. was merely a victim in their fight with HydeBro.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Both of them fought that battle because they were bent on bringing the other side down. It's just Old Smith wasn't playing the game as well as his opponent was.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: In other words, if Smith had managed to make his move before HydeBro did, it would be the Hydes that's hunkering down in Bunkerhill right now instead of his family.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: From that point of view, is Anthony really just a victim?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What do you think, Anthony?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I can't deny that.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: But there are no 'ifs' in this world. I know that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Researcher Silence, I am telling you all this because I want you to understand this—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If you want to do the right thing, you need to first be able to tell what actually is the right thing. Beyond that, you also need to understand that doing the right thing doesn't necessarily mean you don't have to pay the price.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Thanks for the advice.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Well, see ya.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Whoa, she turned into a puddle!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Oh, right. I'm really throwing in the towel with Anthony. Rest assured, you won't find me doing anything uncalled for.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You can talk through the puddle too...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I might even help you guys cover this up. Better thank me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As long as I'm not your villain, let's have another chat the next time we get the chance.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Mr. Anthony, I hope you'll have a wonderful time at Rhodes Island~
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...I appreciate that, Miss.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Well then, Ms. Silence. It's actually time to set out now, isn't it?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mayer, could you help me up?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hmm? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: My legs are a little sore...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh, okay.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hff... phew...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I should've expected as much from a section director. I was so nervous just now, I almost couldn't say anything.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The way I see it, you did really well, Ms. Silence.
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: Yeah, I think so too. You were really cool.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm curious. What kind of a place is Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Anthony

attributes.content: It's a long way to Rhodes Island from here. I'll explain everything you want to know along the way.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I see. Very well, then. I'm looking forward to this journey already.
attributes.name: Anthony
